attributes.action: keep the Hmrc office on the Isle of Wight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish to keep the tax ooffice open in newport isle of wight.We believe in keeping public services that supports the local community. We want to deal with with Hmrc face to face and not over a telephone or over the internet.We believe us the public have the choice to what public services are provided in our local community. We would also wish that all employees in the office keep their jobs as unemployment is high on the island
